mapper.insert: insert into t_fabric_check_record_problem_position ( id, record_id, problem_position, create_time ) values( #{id}, #{recordId}, #{problemPosition}, now() )
mapper.select: select id, record_id as recordId, problem_position as problemPosition from t_fabric_check_record_problem_position where record_id = #{recordId} order by cast(problemPosition as UNSIGNED)
